addCastle() - Method in class kingdom.Duke

Add a knight to this castle's army

Add listeners for pressing keys to the current scene

alternativeMove(double, Kingdom, Castle) - Method in class troops.Troop

AMELIORATION - Static variable in class kingdom.Constants
